Context:
Students must take Liberal Studies courses from at least two out of three categories to graduate (breadth requirement). Students are required to complete at least one lower-level course before taking an upper-level Liberal Studies elective. The college updates Stu-View in real time, and students can register for program courses through it. A form under the Electives Registration section C is filled out for elective registrations. There might be an additional fee to take a course out of sequence, and registration dates for out-of-sequence electives are delayed. Students who have completed General Education or Liberal Studies courses at another post-secondary institution with a grade of 60% or higher may be eligible for exemption from one or more electives.
